caption.p: Conceptual figure highlighting the central role of ACE2 in the potentially deleterious (red) and protective (green) effects of the renin–angiotensin–aldosterone system (RAAS) and its inhibition in the development of severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS) (from Kuster GM, Pfister O, Burkard T, Zhou Q, Twerenbold R, Haaf P, Widmer AF, Osswald S. SARS-CoV2: should inhibitors of the renin�angiotensin system be withdrawn in patients with COVID-19? See pages 1801–1803).
